com.gensym.jgi.download
Class DownloadInterfaces

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--com.gensym.jgi.download.DownloadInterfaces
public class DownloadInterfaces
extends Frame

Implements a Javalink utility that connects to a given G2, and downloads the appropriate Java class(es) corresponding to the specified G2 classes. In order to support a G2 class in a Java environment, this utility will also download the class hierarchy above the specified classes. For a full description of the DownloadInterfaces utility see Chapter 2 of the G2 Javalink/Gateway Users Guide ("Mapping G2 to Java: How to Export a G2 Class as a Java Class").

See Also:

Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Connects to a G2 (default is the G2 on machine "localhost" at port "1111"), and downloads all Java interafaces required to export the specified G2 classes.

usage: java com.gensym.jgi.download.DownloadInterfaces
[-force] [-stubs] [-host hostname] [-port portnumber] -classes g2classname[ g2classname...]

Options:

  • -force -- Optional, download interfaces even if a G2 user class has been previously downloaded
  • -stubs -- Optional, generate the implementations for every Java interface created
  • -host -- Optional, the host machine of the G2 to download classes from (default is localhost)
  • -port -- Optional, the port G2 is running on (default is 1111)
  • -class[es] -- The name(s) of the G2 class(es) to download (separated by commas)
    Parameters:
    args - command line arguments.

    • paint

    public void paint(Graphics g)
    Paints the frame.
    Parameters:
    g - the graphics window
    Overrides:
    paint in class Container

    downloadClasses

    public static void downloadClasses(G2Access x,
                                   String[] g2_class_names,
                                   boolean forceDownload,
                                   boolean createStubs)
    Downloads all required classes (and all classes in their class hierarchy).
    Parameters:
    x - the G2 to download the classes from
    g2_class_names - array containing the names of the G2 classes to be downloaded
    forceDownload - download interfaces even if the G2 user class has previously been downloaded
    createStubs - generate implementations for every Java interface created

    downloadClass

    public static Class downloadClass(G2Access x,
                                  String g2_class_name,
                                  boolean forceDownload,
                                  boolean createStubs)
    Downloads the interfaces required to export a single G2 class.
    Parameters:
    x - the G2 to download the class from
    g2_class_name - the name of the G2 class to be downloaded
    forceDownload - download interfaces even if the G2 user class has previously been downloaded
    createStubs - generate implementations for every Java interface created
    Returns:
    a definition of the newly-downloaded Class

    downloadClass

    public static Class downloadClass(G2Access x,
                                  String g2_class_name,
                                  boolean forceDownload,
                                  boolean createStubs,
                                  StubClassLoader cl)
    Downloads the interfaces required to export a single G2 class.
    Parameters:
    x - the G2 to download the class from
    g2_class_name - the name of the G2 class to be downloaded
    forceDownload - download interfaces even if the G2 use class has previously been downloaded
    createStubs - generate implementations for every Java interface created
    cl - the class loader to use when downloading classes
    Returns:
    a definition of the newly-downloaded Class
